data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Shangrao, Jiangxi, China that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shangrao, Jiangxi, China

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Shangrao to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 757,349, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 63,276 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Shangrao, Jiangxi, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 834,100 souls in Shangrao and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Shangrao, Jiangxi, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Shangrao
